When User clicks on "Login" dropdown and then the "Login" button # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.clickLogin(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And user enters email "abhishekkumarkarn83@gmail.com" and clicks on "Get OTP" button # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.enterEmail(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And User clicks the final "Login" button # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.finalLogin(java.lang.String) And User hovers the cursor to "Holidays" and clicks on "Australia Tour Packages" # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.selectAustraliaPackage(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And User selects a specific "Amazing Australia - Winter" package # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.selectPackage(java.lang.String) And User selects a travel date # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.selectDate() And User clicks on "Calculate Price Package" # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.calculatePrice(java.lang.String) And the system should respond with the "Package Price" page # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.verifyPage(java.lang.String) And User reviews the package price and clicks on continue # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.reviewPriceAndContinue() And the system should respond with the "Booking Summary" page # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.verifyPage(java.lang.String) And User reviews the Booking Summary and clicks "Continue" twice # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.reviewBookingSummary(java.lang.String) And the system should take the user to the "Traveller Details" page # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.goToTravellerPage(java.lang.String) And user enters Traveller1 details: "Rahul" "Kumar" and "123456" # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.traveller1(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And user enters Traveller2 details: "Abhishek" "Kumar" and "654321" # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.traveller2(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And user enters Address for communication: "Rahul" "Kumar" "Patna" "847226" # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.enterAddress(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And user checks the box to add this passenger as a payer # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.checkPayer() And user enters PAN details: "Rahul" "12-09-2002" "SEOAK7575B" # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.enterPan(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And user clicks on "Verify" # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.clickVerify(java.lang.String) Then the system should respond with the message "Invalid Pan Card" # stepDefinitions.Login_n_BookingSteps.verifyPanMessage(java.lang.String)
